duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinates and monitors daily workload activities including productivity tracking and evaluation of team resources, ensuring efficiency and order quality.
Conducts initial training of production floor personnel and fosters continuous improvement on the floor.
Monitors equipment operation, safety, security, and housekeeping, ensuring compliance with company policies.
Reviews line reconciliation paperwork for accuracy and assists in monitoring productivity status and reports.
Assists with employee training and performs other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required and at least 4 years of relevant experience. Experience with Excel, warehouse management systems, lean manufacturing, and 5S. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong team player.
